item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a Software Developer with a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for solving complex problems. I have over four years of experience in programming, specializing in PHP, Laravel, and SQL, with a focus on backend development. I am interested in a range of topics, including algorithms, distributed systems, databases, Elasticsearch, and performance optimization. My background includes significant experience working on high-performance websites, where I reduced load times and improved scalability using technologies like Redis and Elasticsearch.

Understanding Git Submodules: A Guide for Developers #

In the world of version control, Git is one of the most powerful and widely used tools for managing code. However, as projects grow in complexity, managing dependencies between repositories can become challenging. This is where Git submodules come in handy. In this blog post, we will dive into what Git submodules are, how to use them, and the benefits and potential pitfalls of using them in your projects.
